description: Age-up and economy benchmarks by ELO bracket. Source: community data + Spirit of the Law + Hera guides.

400-600.label: Beginner
400-600.notes: Focus on constant villager production and not getting supply blocked

600-800.label: Intermediate
600-800.notes: Should have a build order. Feudal pressure or Fast Castle depending on map

800-1000.label: Advanced
800-1000.notes: Tight build orders, scouting, adapting to opponent. Walling + pressure

1000-1200.label: Expert
1000-1200.notes: Multi-tasking, micro + macro simultaneously, adaptive strategies

1200+.label: Elite
1200+.notes: Near-perfect execution, meta strategies, minimal idle time

general_rules.loom_timing: Before clicking Feudal Age (usually around 8:00-9:00 game time)
